name: Who are you? (itch)
description:
Once again the day ends, and it is time to go to bed... But this time, you are having a very creepy dream... Why this time? Today was a average day... almost for me.

In this game, you will have to unravel the meaning of your dream in order to change your life...or at least, to start living it the way you want.

With 4 amazing endings and fantastic pixel-art scenes, this game will change your vision and, for sure, surprise you...

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys on the keyboard. Avoid the use of mouse or touchscreen, that will reduce the user experience.
